questions.text: Which is the largest continent by area?
questions.explanation: Asia is the largest continent, covering approximately 44.58 million square kilometers.

questions.text: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.explanation: Au (from Latin 'Aurum') is the chemical symbol for Gold.

questions.text: What is the powerhouse of the cell?
questions.explanation: Mitochondria are known as the powerhouse of the cell because they generate most of the cell's ATP energy.

questions.text: Which ocean is the largest by area?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest ocean, covering about 165.25 million square kilometers.

questions.text: The World Health Organization (WHO) was established in which year?
questions.explanation: WHO was established on April 7, 1948, which is now celebrated as World Health Day.

questions.text: The Sahara Desert is located in which continent?
questions.explanation: The Sahara Desert is the world's largest hot desert, located in North Africa.
